revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready.
Vote - AcceptText - Yes this is correct. Be careful to make sure the other corrections to 422 do not get lost in pushing this through.
Finalized - Ready.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Yes, well spotted.
Submit - Checked the edition against image and print edition of PSI IV 422.
Commit - Divided l. 20 after Î³Î¯Î½ÎµÏ„Î±Î¹ to create a new l. 21. Changed numbers in the following lines of recto.
Vote - AcceptText - correction is fine, but line 21 still is missing (!): 21. Ï„Ì£.2Î±.2 á¼‘ÎºÎ¬ÏƒÏ„Ï‰Î¹ Î¶ÎµÏÎ³Î¹.
Submit - Corrected in l. 34 Ï€ÏÎ¿ÎµÏ„Î­ÏÎ±Î¹ to Ï€ÏÎ¿ÎµÏ„Î­ÏÎµÎ¹. (v. Ï€ÏÎ¿Ï„ÎµÏÎ­Ï‰), following the edition and the photo online.
rationalized languages in langUsage
changed editor names to URIs
Automatic insertion of lb tags into origs to match existing lb tags in the reg
converted app type=BL|SoSOL to editorial
changed type=inWord to break=no
Automatically updated revision description
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
moved linebreak and missing characters into reg
updated markup for fractions (rend=tick)
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Automated split from transcoder files
